TestStopAsynchronousPostback
open /SystemWebExtensionsAUT/StopAsynchronousPostback.aspx
verifyText //strong Headlines
verifyText //tr[2]/td This is headline 1.
storeText //tr[7]/td firstUpdateTime
click RefreshButton
verifyVisible AlertMessage
verifyText AlertMessage Retrieving headlines.
pause 4000
verifyNotVisible AlertMessage
verifyNotText //tr[7]/td ${firstUpdateTime}
storeText //tr[7]/td lastUpdateTime
click RefreshButton
verifyVisible AlertMessage
verifyText AlertMessage Retrieving headlines.
pause 500
click CancelRefresh
pause 3000
verifyText //tr[7]/td ${lastUpdateTime}
